text: ebævin dharmaya himi ayagenda, samanayan taba namadinnangenda, (mema nabivarayage pæminima balaporottuven siti ayagenda) kavurun (ohuva) pratiksepa karannoda, ovun niyata vasayenma nira ginnehima sitinnaha. ehi ovun sadakalma rændi sitinnaha. mevænnanma utpadanayan siyallagen imahat napuranya
